summary: This mod add Iddia - Frost Heart Maiden
descriptionHtml:
============
[color=blue]DESCRIPTION[/color]
============
This mod add Iddia- Frost Heart Maiden
As a child she was an orphan, all alone. She was adopted wars, who taught her martial proceedings. After she grew up, she went on a tour of Skyrim. Traveling through Dwemer ruins, she found refuge Snow Elves. Later she lived with them. Her skin was covered with ice, as they do. And her eyes were blue. She now travels around Skyrim. 

 2H weapon , Block , Heavy Armor
Marryable , Essential , Calculated 47lvl
Age 20 , Even Toned Voice , Race = Nord
[color=blue]You can find her in Moorside Inn (Morthal)[/color]
I hope you like it

=============
[color=blue]RECOMMENDED[/color]
=============
Better Female by Bella


=============
[color=blue]REQUIRED[/color]
=============
Apachii Sky Hair Female 1.0


=============
[color=blue]INSTALLATION [/color]
=============
Setup all files to your data folder
=============
[color=blue]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
_______________________

[color=blue]CREDITS:[/color]
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod
author: Den987
